parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player start the project.

parameter.name: help_in_main_menu_command
parameter.answer: The help command or selection number that at the main menu to give instructions to players.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player input help command in the main menu

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player input a wrong selection in the main menu

parameter.name: start_game_command
parameter.answer: The start game command or selection number that at the main menu to start the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player start the game.

parameter.name: help_in_game
parameter.answer: The help command that in the main menu to give avaliable commands list to players.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player input the help command in the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player input the command ls

parameter.name: direction
parameter.answer: A destination name for moving the player into a room or someplace. Assume that the player just got into the game and did nothing.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player input a wrong selection in the main menu

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player input "cd .."

parameter.name: check_inventory_command
parameter.answer: The check-inventory command in the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player does NOT get the item.

parameter.name: directions
parameter.answer: A path from the starting point towards the room or place which contain an item. Seperate the path by ",". Example: "home,living room,bedroom"

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player picks up the item which you guide to in the parameter "directions".

parameter.name: check_inventory_command
parameter.answer: The check-inventory command in the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output AFTER the player got the item.

parameter.name: directions
parameter.answer: A path from the the room or place where the player just picked up an item towards victory. Seperate the path by ",". Example: "..,..,..,forest"

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player wins the game.

parameter.name: exit_command
parameter.answer: The exit game command or selection number that at the main menu to exit the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player exit the game.
